bibl.title: Πλουτάρχου Περί Ίσιδος και Οσίριδος. Ο μύθος.
bibl.note: A commentary on the Egyptian myth of Osiris as presented in Plutarch's De Iside et Osiride. Apart from the classical sources, special attention has been devoted to the information revealed through numerous magical papyri (Greek, demotic and Coptic).
bibl.seg: Panagiota Sarischouli, Πλουτάρχου Περί Ίσιδος και Οσίριδος. Ο μύθος.
Thessaloniki, University Studio Press, 2011, 8°, 306 pp. ISBN 978-960-12-1979-0. €23.

A commentary on the Egyptian myth of Osiris as presented in Plutarch's De Iside et Osiride. Apart from the classical sources, special attention has been devoted to the information revealed through numerous magical papyri (Greek, demotic and Coptic).
